priorityActions: Immediate focus on 'Consolidated Properties' due to significant high-value lease expirations and current vacancy levels.
Execute renewal or backfill strategies for major tenants like Booz Allen Hamilton and Deloitte (Property 2941) and Sheppard Mullin (BofA Plaza) whose leases expire in 2024-2025.
Aggressively market vacant spaces across the portfolio to reduce the current 62.11% rollover exposure.
Monitor retail performance for luxury tenants in Consolidated Properties to ensure retention ahead of upcoming renewals.
